title: UnaliWear Kanega Watch Reviews (Products and Pricing)
body: UnaliWear offers two different pricing structures for the Kanega Watch. You can make an upfront payment for the whole year, or you can pay monthly from the start. No matter how you pay, you have a ...

title: The 3 Best Medical Alert Systems of 2025 | Reviews by Wirecutter
body: The UnaliWear Kanega Medical Alert Watch looks like a smartwatch, but it's actually a robust medical alert system that you can use to send an alert by voice or with the push of a button.
